eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 05:14 PM ON DEC 11, 2025 Effective until 01:14 AM DEC 12, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Phoenix Police is looking for Teresa Estrada last seen on foot in the area of 67th Ave and Thomas Road. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
